definition.text: to keep (something or someone) for oneself

sense.note: typically with drugs or a woman as an object

lyric.text: Don't babysit that, better pass the joint
Instead of hittin' it, then forgettin it, he started babysittin it
Flizy givin' no time for playin' wit 'em, Fly can't baby-sit 'em
I'm hittin' the pussy, y'all babysittin them
Quit babysitting that doe, that doe

feat.origin: Brooklyn, New York City, New York, USA
New York City, New York, USA

lyric.text: Amilion never babysit the mic
Hit it and quit it, my nigga, you shouldn't babysit it
Babysittin' that dope
Get it, man, don't babysit it, especially if you wanna get it

artist.origin: South Central, Los Angeles, California, USA

lyric.text: I'ma get 'em. Why? Cause I cain't babysit 'em
Babysittin' the blunt, I'll get you a car seat

definition.text: to bogart a joint or blunt

lyric.text: You babysittin', shit, you tryin' to hog all the dope
Got a blunt? Fire it up. What'chu babysittin for?
Why you sittin' there babysittin'

artist.origin: Harlem, Manhattan, New York City, New York, USA

lyric.text: Won't you blow it up and stop the babysitting?

definition.text: to sip one's drink slowly, typically to avoid getting drunk

artist.origin: Brooklyn, New York City, New York, USA

feat.origin: The Bronx, New York City, New York, USA

lyric.text: You gon' have another drink, or you just gon' baby-sit
